text:
on click with book:
    name of player's tool contains "&6&l"
    if {%player%.} < 1:
        message "&8[&5&lMAGIC&8] &6&l  &8(&6&8)"
        command "/playsound minecraft:entity.endereye.launch ambient %player% ~ ~ ~ 1.0 1.2 1.0"
        command "/playsound minecraft:entity.firework.launch ambient %player% ~ ~ ~ 1.0 1.3 1.0"
        push player horizontally forwards at speed 3
        set {%player%.} to 7
        loop 7 times:
            wait 1 second
            remove 1 from {%player%.}
        message "&8[&5&lMAGIC&8] &a &6&l"
    else:
        message "&8[&5&lMAGIC&8] &"
